name: Save the Meal
description:
Save the meal 

Image of being out-of-town student who has just moved. Learn to cook simple recipes.

(Remember we are learning to survive!) 

Use the tablet on the fridge to shop. Remember to check ingredients on the board! 

Follow the instructions on the board to complete your recipes.

Credits

Control

Thumbstick sx: to move 

Grip: pick objects
